casebody.data:
HAARHUIS
v.
CHEEK 332P17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 22, 2018 Stephanie W. Anderson, Walter K. Burton, Cam Bordman, Charles M. Ivey, III, Charles M. Ivey, IV, Darren A. McDonough, Attorneys at Law, for Cheek, Emily. J. David Stradley, Robert P. Holmes, IV, Leto Copeley, Attorneys at Law, for Haarhuis, Joris (Administrator), et al. Meghan Wray Deutsch-Blanco, Attorney at Law, for State. Cynthia L. Van Horne, Attorney at Law, for Burton, Sue & Anderson, LLP. John P. Barringer, Jeffrey B. Kuykendal, Attorneys at Law, for Universal Insurance Company.

*100The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of October 2018 by Plaintiff to Reconsider and Vacate Order Allowing Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of October 2018."
